Package moviepackage

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
moviepackage.Driver
public class Driver extends Object
This program is a movie catalog management system that starts by partitionning all valid movie records into new genre-based text files. Then, it loads an array of movie records from each of the [movieGenre].csv files, serializes the resulting movie array to a binary file, and deserializes the serialized arrays from the binary files into a 2D-array of Movie objects, and finally provide an interactive program that allows the user to navigate the 2D-array with console input, displaying user-specified number of movie-records.

    • do_part1

      public static String do_part1(String text, String[] genreArray) throws BadYearException, BadTitleException, BadGenreException, BadScoreException, BadDurationException, BadRatingException, BadNameException, MissingQuotesException, ExcessFieldsException, MissingFieldsException, FileNotFoundException
      This method will generate 17 .csv files related to each movie genre, a .txt file that holds the bad movies and part2_manifest.txt
      Parameters:
      text - A .txt file that holds all the .csv files for movies in a certain time range
      genreArray - An array that holds every movie genre
      Returns:
      part2_manifest.txt
      Throws:
      BadYearException - Corresponds to a missing or invalid year
      BadTitleException - Corresponds to a missing title
      BadGenreException - Corresponds to a missing or invalid genre
      BadScoreException - Corresponds to a missing or invalid score
      BadDurationException - Corresponds to a missing or invalid duration
      BadRatingException - Corresponds to a missing rating
      BadNameException - Corresponds to a missing name
      MissingQuotesException - Corresponds to missing quotes at the start AND end of a movie title
      ExcessFieldsException - Corresponds to excess fields to a movie
      MissingFieldsException - Corresponds to missing fields to a movie
      FileNotFoundException - Thrown when a file is not found

    • do_part2

      public static String do_part2(String text, Movie[] movieArray, String[] genreArray)
      This method will serialize the genre files into a .ser format and create part3_manifest.txt
      Parameters:
      text - A .txt file that holds all the [MovieGenre].csv files
      movieArray - An empty array of Movie objects that will be filled
      genreArray - An array that holds every movie genre
      Returns:
      part3_manifest.txt

    • do_part3

      public static void do_part3(String text, Movie[] movieArray, String[] genreArray)
      This method will call the method deserializeFiles, then display an interactive menu in the console.
      Parameters:
      text - A .txt file that holds all the [MovieGenre].ser files
      movieArray - An array of Movie objects, previously filled in do_part2
      genreArray - An array that holds every movie genre
      See Also:

      public static Movie[][] deserializeFiles(String text, String[] genreArray)
      This method handles the deserialization of the genre.ser files, for do_part3.
      Parameters:
      text - A .txt file that holds all the [MovieGenre].ser files
      genreArray - An array that holds every movie genre
      Returns:
      all_movies
